name: Hilux Stunt Driver
description:
The wild and crazy fantasy stunts city will blow your mind! new modern stunt environment, awesome car smashing machines, and mechanized techno based obstacles. Perform high jumps on colossal ramps; accelerate through fiery hoops; jimmy through deadly propellers; knock down and smash all types of obstacles

KEY FEATURES:
- Many different kinds of stunts
- Targeted time mode
- Stunt you car exact
- Realistic car physics and volume
- extreme driving challenge
